name: RUN (itch) (monsday)
description:
[ nowhere to go but forward ]

avoid detection. evade the obstacles. 
and most of all, don’t forget to breathe. 

> controls; 

click (tap on mobile) to swim upwards and keep yourself from sinking. 

> team; 

pm: charlie
design: emma
art: bummo
programming: limky 
music/sfx: roy 

this game was made in 9 days for the 2021 1 button jam.
